casebody.data:
CROSSTEX ENERGY SERVICES, LP, Crosstex Lig, LLC and Crosstex Processing Services, LLC
v.
TEXAS BRINE COMPANY, LLC NO. 2019-CC-0536 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 6, 2019

Stay recalled. Writ denied as moot.

HUGHES, J., would grant and remand for evidentiary hearing.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and remand for evidentiary hearing.

GENOVESE, J., would grant and remand for evidentiary hearing.
